== Ramnagar (602650) ==
      
Ramnagar is a village in the [[Supa]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 1965.49 hectares and harbouring 1771 households with total population of 8055 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[KHANAPUR]] is at a distance of 30 km. Male population is 4043 and female population is 4012. Scheduled Caste Population is 862 and Scheduled Tribes population is 101. Census Location Code of the village is 602650<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Literate male population: 2966 (73.36%)
* Literate female population: 2427 (60.49%)
